00063 AA_API void
00064 aa_dump_mat( FILE *file, const double *A, size_t m, size_t n );
00065 
00074 #define AA_DUMP_MAT( file, fmt, A, m, n)                                \
00075     {                                                                   \
00076         for( size_t aa_debug_$_i = 0; aa_debug_$_i < m;                 \
00077              aa_debug_$_i ++ ) {                                        \
00078             for( size_t aa_debug_$_j = 0; aa_debug_$_j < n-1;           \
00079                  aa_debug_$_j ++ ) {                                    \
00080                 fprintf(file, fmt"\t",                                  \
00081                         AA_MATREF(A, m, aa_debug_$_i,aa_debug_$_j));    \
00082             }                                                           \
00083             fprintf(file, fmt"\n",                                      \
00084                     AA_MATREF(A, m, aa_debug_$_i, n-1) );               \
00085         }                                                               \
00086     }                                                                   \
00087
